Is that right?
Assuming same as the Q3 promo  by right cannot have any transaction in Sep (30 days before 1 Oct)

For existing Accounts  the Incremental Fresh Funds must result in at least a corresponding increment in the Account’s day-end balance throughout the Promotion Period AND Earmark Period as compared to the Account’s Monthly Average Balance for March 2024. - do you mean this clause?

No he meant literally the funds should not be moved in Sept. Not too sure how are they going to enforce it or check.
